GSD.description:
KVM: LAPIC: Also cancel preemption timer during SET_LAPIC

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.19 by commit 54b3439c8e70e0bcfea59aeef9dd98908cbbf655. For more details please see the references link.
